name: Patator Bird Arcade Shooting
description:
Patator Bird Arcade Shooting

The game is about shooting targets placed on a net to get as much points as possible in a limited amount of time.

We built a tennis ball canon from scratch using PCV tubes, stretchers and wooden bars.  We placed a net supporting targets with photo-sensor that detect if a ball is successfully hitting them . The whole IT and display is manage through Unity .

This project was realized  for a practical exercise of accessibility at the CNAM ENJMIN. Don't hesitate to check our post-mortem for further details.

Antonin Herrero : Programmer from the Southern Land

Pierre Ulysse : Programmer anti-merle

Julen Laborde : Powerful Handyman

 Téo Salvi : Artistic Handyman

 Rémi Prodeo : "Da boss" Handyman

 Damien Drouillard : Melodic Handyman

Nicolas Victoire : Photographer Handyman

Antoine Thevenoux : Milice anti-merle Manager
